statements: SELECT * FROM email_tracking;
SELECT email_id, open_rate FROM email_tracking;
SELECT click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM email_tracking;
SELECT * FROM email_tracking WHERE open_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM email_tracking ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;
SELECT email_id, open_rate, click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM email_tracking;
SELECT email_id, open_rate FROM email_tracking WHERE click_through_rate > 0.5;
SELECT click_through_rate, conversion_rate FROM email_tracking ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT email_id, AVG(open_rate) AS avg_open_rate FROM email_tracking GROUP BY email_id;
SELECT AVG(open_rate) AS avg_open_rate, AVG(click_through_rate) AS avg_ctr FROM email_tracking;
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp, user_id FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT user_id, open_timestamp, email_id FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates;
SELECT email_id, click_timestamp FROM click_through_rates WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, click_timestamp FROM click_through_rates ORDER BY click_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_timestamp DESC;
SELECT email_id, click_timestamp FROM click_through_rates WHERE user_id = 456 ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC;
SELECT MAX(open_timestamp) AS max_open_timestamp FROM email_open_rates;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS click_count FROM click_through_rates GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates WHERE email_id = 'abc123';
SELECT email_id, open_time FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_time DESC;
SELECT recipient_email, open_time FROM email_open_rates WHERE recipient_email = 'john@domain.com';
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email_id, click_id, recipient_email FROM click_through_rates LIMIT 10;
SELECT email_id, open_time, recipient_email FROM email_open_rates
SELECT recipient_email, open_time, email_id FROM email_open_rates
SELECT email_id, recipient_email, open_time FROM email_open_rates
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT click_id, click_time, recipient_email FROM click_through_rates WHERE email_id = 'example_email_id'
SELECT * FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp FROM email_open_rates WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY click_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_conversions FROM conversion_rates GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_conversions > 5;
SELECT user_id, email_address FROM user_info WHERE registration_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY registration_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE email_address = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT email_id, open_timestamp FROM email_open_rates ORDER BY open_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, click_timestamp FROM click_through_rates WHERE click_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT user_id, conversion_timestamp FROM conversion_rates WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, email_address, registration_timestamp FROM user_info ORDER BY registration_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT end_date, campaign_name, campaign_id FROM EmailCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT click_id, campaign_id, click_date FROM EmailClicks ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT converted_to, conversion_date FROM Conversions WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM EmailCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM EmailCampaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT EmailOpens.open_date, EmailOpens.IP_address, EmailCampaigns.campaign_name FROM EmailCampaigns INNER JOIN EmailOpens ON EmailCampaigns.campaign_id = EmailOpens.campaign_id;

SELECT EmailOpens.IP_address, EmailClicks.clicked_link, Conversions.converted_to FROM EmailOpens INNER JOIN EmailClicks ON EmailOpens.campaign_id = EmailClicks.campaign_id INNER JOIN Conversions ON EmailClicks.campaign_id = Conversions.campaign_id;

SELECT EmailCampaigns.campaign_name, CampaignMetrics.open_rate, CampaignMetrics.click_through_rate, CampaignMetrics.conversion_rate FROM EmailCampaigns INNER JOIN CampaignMetrics ON EmailCampaigns.campaign_id = CampaignMetrics.campaign_id ORDER BY CampaignMetrics.conversion_rate DESC;
